app.name: 2Pick
nickname_length: Nickname must be between 1 and 20 characters
nickname_update_rate: Can be changed once per day
login.tos: By logging in, you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Statement.
page.description: 2 Pick, Pick Your Top Choice: Songs, Celebrities, Anime, Pets, Food, Movies... From a Pool of :size, Round by Round Elimination!
over_upload_limit: You can upload up to :limit URLs at a time.
api-response-message.OVER_ELEMENT_SIZE: The number of elements exceeds the limit
api-response-message.OVER_UPLOAD_LIMIT: The number of URLs exceeds the limit
api-response-message.NO_ELEMENT_CREATED: Unable to create element (possibly duplicate element, invalid link, or maximum element limit reached)
api-response-message.UPLOAD_SIZE_RATE_LI: Upload rate limit exceeded, please try again later
game.save_progress: Your progress will be automatically saved for 3 days, so you can continue voting when you come back.
game.select_option_hint: You need to select an option.
donate.description: If you like this website, consider supporting me so I can continue to improve its features
